PERSONA:
john is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country, and identifies as a protestant evangelical christian, attending religious services once or twice a month.

despite having only some college education, john has achieved a comfortable upper-income level, earning between $90,000 and $100,000 annually. he is a registered voter and leans towards the republican party, aligning with conservative ideological views.

john is an active user of the internet, accessing it several times a day, likely to stay informed and connected. however, he does not currently engage in any volunteer activities.

overall, john represents a demographic of older, financially stable, and religiously devout individuals who hold traditional values and support the republican party's conservative principles. his life experiences and beliefs shape his worldview and voting preferences.
